# Project Overview

This project is an abstracted NestJS module designed to simplify the integration of Slack into various applications. It provides a set of utilities and services that allow developers to easily perform Slack tasks (messaging) without dealing with the complexities of integration.

## Libraries and Frameworks

- NestJS - https://docs.nestjs.com/ 
- Slack - https://docs.slack.dev/tools/node-slack-sdk/web-api/

## Important Considerations

- Always use NestJS documentation for guidance on module creation and service injection.
